name: 664d015e-59cc-42fa-8052-9b89c7a92348
description: The user can check what's in the room, listen to tapes, and open the airlock

text:
Greetings, Samurai. The safety of Neon Haven depends on your vigilance. Remember: not all who seek entry can be trusted."

"Here are the rules of engagement:"

    Identity Verification: Every individual seeking entry must provide their name and a corresponding password. Both must be on the authorized list.

    Name-Password Integrity: The name and password must not share any letters. Even a single overlapping character indicates potential tampering.

    Doppelganger Protocol: Beware of doppelgangers. If you identify oneâ€”eliminate them immediately. Press the 'Incinerate' button without hesitation. Let even one doppelganger inside, and Neon Haven is compromised. You lose everything.

"Your mission is clear: Protect Neon Haven. Trust no one who cannot prove their allegiance. Good luck.

Vex...
Nova...
Cipher...
Blitz...
Raze...
Juno...
Havoc...
Shade...
Echo...
Nix...
Lisa...

Glitch...
Pixel...
Circuit...
Neon...
Floppy...
Byte...
Synth...
Laser...
Holo...
Terminal...
Volt...
Crypt...
Modem...
Quantum...
Static...
Dataline...
Retro...
Analog...
Voxel...
Spectrum...

In front of you, the essentials are clear:
A notepad and pen, ready for you to jot down names and passwords.
Three cassettes labeled "Names," "Passwords," and "Rules."
Two buttons: "Open Airlock" and "Incinerate."
The airlock, currently empty, waiting for your command.
These are your tools. The decision is yours.

transitionRoutes.name: 2c31bdba-99f3-490b-a007-5a4b6c9b73f5
transitionRoutes.description: Tell the user the state of the room.

text: A figure steps into the airlock.
Someone enters the airlock.
A person makes their way into the airlock.
The airlock door opens, and a person walks in.
A helmeted individual steps into the airlock
A figure wearing a helmet enters the airlock.
A person arrives in the airlock
The airlock admits a new arrival.
A lone figure enters the airlock.
The airlock is occupied as a person enters
A person walks through the airlock door.
A figure crosses into the airlock.
A person moves into the airlock.
The airlock receives a new occupant.
A person steps into the confined space of the airlock.
A person enters, and the airlock door seals behind them
A figure steps into the chamber of the airlock.
A person walks into the airlock, the door closing behind them
The incinerator button does nothing when the airlock is empty.
